rfp_objective: Establish centralized AI governance framework with automated policy enforcement, enable secure and compliant use of generative AI, provide self-service AI capabilities to business users, implement model lifecycle management and monitoring, ensure auditability, explainability, and transparency of AI systems, accelerate time-to-value for AI use cases
requirements: Platform implementation including infrastructure provisioning and configuration
Integration with existing enterprise systems (identity, data, security)
AI governance framework design and implementation
Model development and deployment pipeline setup
Training and enablement for technical and business users
Documentation including architecture diagrams, runbooks, and user guides
